name: PagerDuty to JIRA Connector
description: Create JIRA tickets when a PagerDuty incident has been created.

JIRA_USERNAME.description: The username of the JIRA user that will update the JIRA ticket.

JIRA_PASSWORD.description: The password for your JIRA user.

JIRA_SUBDOMAIN.description: The name of your JIRA subdomain, as it appears in the URL.

JIRA_PROJECT.description: The project that you would like the ticket created in JIRA.  This field is the prefix for the project (e.g. 'SUP')

JIRA_ISSUE_TYPE.description: The type of issue that you'd like created within JIRA (e.g. Bug, Deliverable, etc...).

PAGERDUTY_API_TOKEN.description: Your 20-character alphanumeric PagerDuty API Access token.

PAGERDUTY_SUBDOMAIN.description: The name of your PagerDuty subdomain, as it appears in the URL.
